CustomField.description: Correlating Session Id - Global session id for the Customer's session or the other channels like IVR. This GSID will be passed to Teammate Tool from other Channels while handing over the contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Correlating Session Id - Global session id for the Customer's session or the other channels like IVR. This GSID will be passed to Teammate Tool from other Channels while handing over the contact.
CustomField.label: Correlating GSID
